official_title: A bill to modify the navigation project for Moriches and Shinnecock Inlets, New York.

summary.text: Modifies the navigation project at Moriches and Shinnecock Inlets, New York, to the extent necessary to require the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to provide for the construction of the navigation feature independent of other features of such project as authorized.

titles.title: A bill to modify the navigation project for Moriches and Shinnecock Inlets, New York.
